root: ^You think you can defeat me, mortal? I am the master of corruption, the ruler of this temple. You are nothing to me.

main: ^You will pay for what you have done. My father... he came here to defeat you and never returned. I won't let you get away with it.
^Your father was a fool. He underestimated my power and paid the price. You too will fall by my hands.
^Curse you demon. You will pay for what you've done.
